title: Langara, The Penthouse at Sandy Cove Barbados Joins the Blue Sky Luxury Caribbean Villa Portfolio
text:
Blue Sky Luxury adds a unique vacation option with Langara. Four-bedrooms with an exclusive address on the Platinum Coast, the Penthouse boasts a private pool with a stunning view, a staff of four including a butler and private chef, “smart home” technology and a private yacht, the ultimate in an attainable luxury vacation.
ST. PETER, Barbados (PRWEB) October 01, 2015
Blue Sky Luxury has added Langara, the Penthouse at Sandy Cove Barbados to their select Flagship Caribbean villa portfolio. The holiday home rental experts at Blue Sky Luxury now represent over 250 of the finest properties in Antigua, Barbados, Dominica, Jamaica, St. Barts, St. Martin/St. Maarten and Saint Lucia.
“Langara, the Penthouse adds a new dimension to our Barbados portfolio,” said Kathy-Dawn Burke, Leader-Holiday Home Rentals at Blue Sky Luxury. “This beautiful residence offers an abundance of ultra-modern features effortlessly melded with every luxury. The location is the perfect hub for that Bajan vacation experience from paddle-boarding and fishing to sampling a bounty of local ingredients prepared when, where and how they like it by a private chef.”
A unique vacation option with panoramic views of the Caribbean Sea, the four-bedroom, four-and-a-half bath Langara spans the top floor of the exclusive Sandy Cove residential development on Barbados’ Platinum Coast. The 6,500 square feet of indoor spaces marry modern design with tropical ambiance, opening seamlessly to terraces furnished for al fresco dining, lounging and swimming in the Penthouse private pool.
Beachfront living at its finest, guests can discover hidden beaches aboard the home’s private yacht, explore the white-sand beach cove and vibrant reef with snorkels and SUP boards, or explore Barbados with a private car and driver. The Langara luxury experience also includes elevator access to the Sandy Cove facilities including a lagoon pool, gym and sauna.
Crystal chandeliers light the master suite which opens to a terrace, sundeck and extravagant en-suite bath with marble rain showers and free-standing tub while the three guest bedrooms, one with a private terrace, feature their own marble en-suite bathrooms. Rooms are all Wi-Fi accessible and feature LED Smart TVs with cable, Apple TV, Blu-ray players and movies and stereo. A “smart home,” Langara is also outfitted with state-of-the-art technology controlling the entertainment centres, lighting, air-conditioning and security features.
A staff of four sees to every detail for Langara’s guests including a butler and private chef preparing meals that rival nearby five-star restaurants. In addition to the attention of Langara’s staff, the Blue Sky Luxury Concierge Can team provides personalized guest services that begin before vacationers ever leave home from arranging tours and personalized experiences to advising the chef on menu favorites and dietary requirements.
Rates for Langara start at US$2,500.00 per night for a minimum 5-night stay and bookings also include a Blue Sky Luxury exclusive offer of miles for the Virgin Atlantic Airways Flying Club or American Airlines AAdvantage loyalty programs. Guests also have the option of Blue Sky Luxury’s exclusive VIP Meet and Greet service including a fast-track through the airport on arrival and transfer to the Penthouse.
For more information call Blue Sky Luxury at 1-246-622-4466, email experts@blueskyluxury.com and online at BlueSkyLuxury.com , @BlueSkyLuxury and facebook.com/BlueSkyLuxury.
About Blue Sky Luxury
Blue Sky Luxury’s portfolio of over 250 Caribbean premiere villa properties includes over 100 of the finest holiday homes in Barbados and another 150 best-in-class vacation homes in Antigua, Dominica, Jamaica, St. Barts, Saint Lucia and St. Martin/St. Maarten ranging from luxurious oceanfront villas to charming and relaxed beachfront apartments. The Blue Sky Luxury “Concierge Can” experts provide personalized service and customized vacations guaranteeing the ultimate luxury vacation experience.
